original_text: Many people also came to him from Judea, from Jerusalem and from a region of Israel called Idumea. They also came from places on the other side of the Jordan River, and from the towns called Tyre and Sidon. Many people had heard about the things that Jesus was doing. That is why all these people came to him.
korean_text: 유대와 예루살렘과 이두매와 요단 강 건너편과 또 두로와 시돈 근처에서 많은 무리가 그가 하신 큰 일을 듣고 나아오는지라

sentences.original_text: Many people also came to him from Judea
and from a region of Israel called Idumea
They also came from places on the other side of the Jordan River
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 요단 강 건너편 지역에서 왔고

sentences.original_text: and from the towns called Tyre and Sidon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 티로와 시돈이라 불리는 도시들에서 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: Many people had heard about the things that Jesus was doing
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 예수가 하고 있는 일들을 들었었습니다

sentences.original_text: That is why all these people came to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이 모든 사람들이 그에게 온 것입니다
